Texts.Chs: 干得漂亮！这张卡片上有我跟你说的地方的坐标（翻译PS：飞船任务面板传送）， 在那里你可以认识许多科学家！然后，请使用这个^orange;三度仪^reset;， 它可以帮助你查询^orange;任务和状态信息^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Great! This card contains directions to the facility I spoke of. There are many fellow scientists there with whom you can meet! Also, please use this handy ^orange;Tricorder^reset;, as it will help you access ^orange;quests and status information^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 你的任务是制造一个^orange;加工台^white;，^green; 从你的制造菜单[C]制造一个^reset;来完成这个任务。
Texts.Eng: You've been tasked with creating a ^orange;Machining Table^white;. ^green;Build one on your default crafting menu [C]^reset; to complete this task.
